data.comment: The big names in today's match at Versluys Arena have now been confirmed.
The match is underway. Oostende have kicked-off.
In the minute 1, Goal! Marius Noubissi gives Beerschot a 0-1 lead.
Oostende's Anton Tanghe has been booked in Ostend.
Makhtar Gueye (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Bram Van Driessche.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Bram Van Driessche blows to start the second-half. Beerschot with the kick-off.
Denis Prychynenko (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, Goal! Oostende draw level to 1-1 through a Kevin Vandendriessche header.
Fashion Sakala is replacing Makhtar Gueye for Oostende at Versluys Arena.
The home team replace Robbie D'Haese with Cameron McGeehan.
In the minute 72, At Versluys Arena, Marko Kvasina has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Marius Noubissi puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
The away team have replaced Tarik Tissoudali with Alexander Maes. This is the first substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
In the minute 83, Dario Van Den Buijs (Beerschot) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a second substitution, with Euloge Placca Fessou replacing Raphael Holzhauser.
Gregory Grisez is on a sub for Marius Noubissi for Beerschot.
